similarities.name: Alistar
similarities.description: League has a lot of permastun-initiators like Earthshaker. Good news is you don't need Blink Dagger to be viable. Alistar can jump and stun enemies at lvl 2 already!

similarities.name: Aatrox
similarities.description: Aatrox can turn on his God-mode with R and delete squishy targets just like Sven.

similarities.name: Gangplank
similarities.description: Ahoy, sailor! Gangplank is similar to Kunkka in many aspects and has his own combos with barrels to perform compared to Kunkka's X-Mark + Ship.

similarities.name: Sivir
similarities.description: Sivir's main mechanic are glaves too. She can also block enemy spell like Anti-mage with her E and speed-up her allies with ultimate.

similarities.name: Udyr
similarities.description: Udyr lacks beasts to control but he can turn himself into them. Changing wild forms of bear, turtle, tiger and phoenix Udyr is furious enemy to fight with.

similarities.name: Quinn
similarities.description: Quinn is Marksman and ranged champion yet she has her eagle Valor that helps her in fight.

similarities.name: Shyvana
similarities.description: Shyvana is Dragon Knight on steroids. She can dive into enemies and burn everything aroung her.

similarities.name: Thresh
similarities.description: You will not be able to initiate through 3 screens yet Tresh has powerful hook, cogs-like ultimate and despite being a support Tresh is much more dangerous then Clockwerk.

similarities.name: Taric
similarities.description: Taric is very similar to Omniknight. He protects his allies and makes them invulnerable.

similarities.name: Xin Zhao
similarities.description: Xin jumps onto enemies without fear isolating unfortunate target to delete it.

similarities.name: Pantheon
similarities.description: Pantheon can be really annoying on lane with his spears.

similarities.name: Dr. Mundo
similarities.description: Despite not being farm-machine Dr. Mundo can also turn his chemical rage-mode with regeneration and is quite dangerous target for enemy to approach.

similarities.name: Gragas
similarities.description: Gragas may not have the ability to split into 3 spirits... yet the love for booze may have it's place too...

similarities.name: Galio
similarities.description: Galio is a great choice for those who like to protect their friends.

similarities.name: Maokai
similarities.description: Forest for the trees.

similarities.name: Yuumi
similarities.description: This kitty can attach to his allies and buff them.

similarities.name: Hecarim
similarities.description: Hecarim is not very tanky but he speeds himself up and dives into enemies just like on Centaur's ultimate.

similarities.name: Rammus
similarities.description: Rammus has similar passive and similar ultimate. He is an annoying tank who can literally faceroll into enemies.

similarities.name: Rumble
similarities.description: Rumble may be a little bit less crazy then Timber, but certainly creates more chaos on the battlefield.

similarities.name: Qiyana
similarities.description: Despite not being as tanky as Timbersaw, Qiyana can interact with walls, river and bushes. She can throw her disk and delete enemies just like good old Timber.

similarities.name: Illaoi
similarities.description: Bristleback probably would fit nice into League's roster. By his nature he is true Juggernaut (champion class). He is hard to kill and he kills hard if you stay near him. League has a lot of unique champions that are similar to Bristleback by role.

similarities.name: Nunu & Willump
similarities.description: Nunu and his friend can create big snowball and tag team with his allies.

similarities.name: Vi
similarities.description: Vi loves fists fight too and has similar ultimate ability to Walrush Punch.

similarities.name: Ornn
similarities.description: Ornn has similar ultimate and role. Also you will be surprised with unique item-mechanics.

similarities.name: Jarvan IV
similarities.description: Jarvan jumps into enemies closing them inside duelish arena.

similarities.name: Syndra
similarities.description: Syndra similarly to Kaolin operates her objects (dark spheres) to control the battlefield.

similarities.name: Anivia
similarities.description: Anivia is cryoPhoenix, literally.

similarities.name: Jarvan IV
similarities.description: Jarvan has his own arena too.

similarities.name: Kassadin
similarities.description: In League every champion has blink since 0 min as summoner spell... yet Kassadin has his own too in skill. He is late-game mage who can delete enemies if farmed.

similarities.name: Ashe
similarities.description: Ashe is certainly your choice if you play Drow Ranger.

similarities.name: Master Yi
similarities.description: Master Yi is furious and fast right click hero with very similar skillset.

similarities.name: Yasuo
similarities.description: Yasuo is a bit difficult champion to perform yet in right hands his blade cuts enemies like onions.

similarities.name: Nidalee
similarities.description: Nidalee has similar to arrow skillshot and in general her role in game is quite similar to Mirana's.

similarities.name: Kai'Sa
similarities.description: Kai'Sa can't morph her attributes (there is not attributes in League) yet her skills and gameflow is really close to Morphling.

similarities.name: Azir
similarities.description: Azir manipulates an army of sand soldiers. His skillset is not even close to Lancer's yet he feels close to him as a champion in general.

similarities.name: Morgana
similarities.description: Morgana is a support too and she has very strong stun similar to Venge's Magic Missile.

similarities.name: Mordekaiser
similarities.description: Dark and deathful Mordekaiser with his unique ultimate reminds Abaddon in some ways.

similarities.name: Lissandra
similarities.description: Freeze your enemies to death with Lissandra.

similarities.name: Shaco
similarities.description: Shaco is a 'troll' champion that can go invisible and create clone to help him in fight or to juke opponents.

similarities.name: Darius
similarities.description: Darius is very similar to Axe with his deadly spin and finisher ultimate.

similarities.name: Malzahar
similarities.description: Malzahar is a mid lane mage who can control hin enemies similar to Bane.

similarities.name: Skarner
similarities.description: Skarner can lasso his enemies too.

similarities.name: Singed
similarities.description: Singed runs around fight with his own version of Firefly.

similarities.name: Warwick
similarities.description: Warwick is a bloody hunter. He can smell injured enemies and speed up to finish them just like Bloodseeker.

similarities.name: Vladimir
similarities.description: Vladimir is a blood mage with spells evolving around blood and vampirism.

similarities.name: Shaco
similarities.description: Shaco has invisibility and his deadly knives to delete squishy enemies.

similarities.name: Elise
similarities.description: Elise can transform herself into spider and pop up squishy targets.

similarities.name: Hecarim
similarities.description: Hecarim is probably closest champion to Chaos Knight if you feel like controlling horse-like hero.

similarities.name: Soraka
similarities.description: They have same ultimate. Yet Soraka can't control creeps and is fully focused around healing her allies.

similarities.name: Twitch
similarities.description: Twitch can jump out of nowhere and inflict huge attack damage to his enemies.

similarities.name: Sona
similarities.description: Sona helps her team with aura-spells and has powerful aoe-stun ultimate.

similarities.name: Janna
similarities.description: Janna protects her allies with slow and has channeling ultimate that heals allies around her.

similarities.name: Amumu
similarities.description: Amumu damages everyone around him and has powerful aoe-stun ultimate.

similarities.name: Zyra
similarities.description: Zyra operates her plants to control battlefield, zone enemies and inflict damage.

similarities.name: Soraka
similarities.description: Soraka is main healer in League while at the same time being one of few champions that have silence in their spells.

similarities.name: Fiddlesticks
similarities.description: Fiddlesticks can seem a bit weird champion at first glance yet he has powerful ultimate similar to Death Prophet and he can suck life from his enemies (literally).

similarities.name: Swain
similarities.description: Swain has similar playstyle and ultimate.

similarities.name: Bard
similarities.description: Bard is very unique champion and he acts like disruptor for enemy champions in some way. He can create holes through walls on the map and control battlefield with his aoe-stasis ultimate and Shackleshot-like stun.

similarities.name: Mordekaiser
similarities.description: Mordekaiser can isolate his target in separate existence where nothing can help his victim.

similarities.name: Yasuo
similarities.description: Leaue doesn't have quite copy of Ember yet Yasuo might be closest to him. It's skill-dependent melee figher who dashes around enemies.

similarities.name: Nidalee
similarities.description: Nidalee can't enchant creatures yet she can use her deadly spear to delete enemies and transform herself info puma.

similarities.name: Amumu
similarities.description: Amumu has similar devastating aoe-ultimate and he can toggle on/off Midnignt Pulse around himself.

similarities.name: Malzahar
similarities.description: Stare into the abyss.

similarities.name: Jax
similarities.description: Jax is powerful melee fighter who can jump around and stun enemies.

similarities.name: Lulu
similarities.description: Lulu can disable her enemies and buff her allies. Her spells have different effect depending on target.

similarities.name: Corki
similarities.description: League has his own Gyrocopter too. He has different skillset yet in general they are very similar.

similarities.name: LeBlanc
similarities.description: LeBlanc can cast a lot of combos combining her spells. Her ultimate copies her previous casted basic skill.

similarities.name: Orianna
similarities.description: Orianna operates her orb in many ways to control battlefield.

similarities.name: Taliyah
similarities.description: Taliyah is a stone mage. She requires high micro skills and can ride walls (literally).

similarities.name: Katarina
similarities.description: Katarina performs fast combos and skill resets to delete enemies in fight.

similarities.name: Rumble
similarities.description: Rumble isn't a dragon yet his burn spells and Macropyre-like ultimate feels like Jakiro in some ways.

similarities.name: Shyvana
similarities.description: Dragon's breath!

similarities.name: Zilean
similarities.description: Zilean is all about time. He can do some legit damage with his time bombs and also help his teammates with experience or give them free Aegis of Immortality from Dota for several seconds.

similarities.name: Anivia
similarities.description: Anivia can stun and damage opponents with magic similar to Leshrac. She can also revive from egg once killed!

similarities.name: Brand
similarities.description: They have similar ultimates and also a lot of magical damage output.

similarities.name: Olaf
similarities.description: Olaf is a raging meat that can turn on his rage mode (similar to Lifestealer's Q) and has more lifesteal and attack speed the less health he has.

similarities.name: Annie
similarities.description: Annie is a fire mage who can delete her enemies with her powerful fire spells and her friend Tibbers...

similarities.name: Lulu
similarities.description: Lulu doesn't have deadly finger yet she has hex on her W too and she is playing similar disabler role as Lion.
